trening1: During my internship at Web Master, I contributed to real-world projects using modern web technologies such as HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind, JavaScript, and React. I collaborated within a team on large-scale projects, which strengthened my teamwork and problem-solving skills.
trening2: I also gained hands-on experience with Git and GitHub for version control and team collaboration. Additionally, I worked on building and managing databases with Firebase and JSON Server, enabling the development of fully functional interactive applications.
trening3: This internship allowed me to transform theoretical knowledge into practical experience, and some of these projects are showcased in my Portfolio.
